commands.name: create_document
commands.description: Create a new Word document with optional metadata.

commands.name: copy_document
commands.description: Create a copy of a Word document.

commands.name: get_document_info
commands.description: Get information about a Word document.

commands.name: get_document_text
commands.description: Extract all text from a Word document.

commands.name: get_document_outline
commands.description: Get the structure of a Word document.

commands.name: list_available_documents
commands.description: List all .docx files in the specified directory.

commands.name: get_document_xml
commands.description: Get the raw XML structure of a Word document.

commands.name: insert_header_near_text
commands.description: Insert a header (with specified style) before or after the target paragraph. Specify by text or paragraph index. Args: filename (str), target_text (str, optional), header_title (str), position ('before' or 'after'), header_style (str, default 'Heading 1'), target_paragraph_index (int, optional).

commands.name: insert_line_or_paragraph_near_text
commands.description: Insert a new line or paragraph (with specified or matched style) before or after the target paragraph. Specify by text or paragraph index. Args: filename (str), target_text (str, optional), line_text (str), position ('before' or 'after'), line_style (str, optional), target_paragraph_index (int, optional).

commands.name: insert_numbered_list_near_text
commands.description: Insert a bulleted or numbered list before or after the target paragraph. Specify by text or paragraph index. Args: filename (str), target_text (str, optional), list_items (list of str), position ('before' or 'after'), target_paragraph_index (int, optional), bullet_type ('bullet' for bullets or 'number' for numbered lists, default: 'bullet').

commands.name: add_paragraph
commands.description:
Add a paragraph to a Word document with optional formatting.

Args:
    filename: Path to Word document
    text: Paragraph text content
    style: Optional paragraph style name
    font_name: Font family (e.g., 'Helvetica', 'Times New Roman')
    font_size: Font size in points (e.g., 14, 36)
    bold: Make text bold
    italic: Make text italic
    color: Text color as hex RGB (e.g., '000000')

commands.name: add_heading
commands.description:
Add a heading to a Word document with optional formatting.

Args:
    filename: Path to Word document
    text: Heading text
    level: Heading level (1-9)
    font_name: Font family (e.g., 'Helvetica')
    font_size: Font size in points (e.g., 14)
    bold: Make heading bold
    italic: Make heading italic
    border_bottom: Add bottom border (for section headers)
